SET(TRIANGLE_SRC ${TRIANGLE_SOURCE_DIR}/triangle.c ${TRIANGLE_SOURCE_DIR}/triangle_interface.c)

message(STATUS "Triangle compile flags: ${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}")
